thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oaktree Specialty Lending Qtrly Total Investment Income $0.24 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oaktree Specialty Lending Qtrly Total Investment Income $0.24 Per Share
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Oaktree Specialty Lending Corp:
* OAKTREE SPECIALTY LENDING CORPORATION ANNOUNCES FIRST FISCAL QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* OAKTREE SPECIALTY LENDING CORP QTRLY TOTAL INVESTMENT INCOME OF $33.9 MILLION, OR $0.24 PER SHARE
* OAKTREE SPECIALTY LENDING CORP QTRLY NET INVESTMENT INCOME OF $13.3 MILLION, OR $0.09 PER SHARE
* OAKTREE SPECIALTY LENDING - IDENTIFIED CORE INVESTMENTS TO HOLD & DEVELOPED MONETIZATION STRATEGY FOR NON-CORE INVESTMENTS TO EXIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
